message: Bob, I have a product that I believe will be of great value to you.  It's something that I know you've been looking for, and I'm confident it can help your business grow. I'm willing to offer it to you at a price of $1150000. This is a significant discount from its true value, and I believe it's a fair offer that benefits both of us.  Let me know if you're interested and we can discuss the details further.
